verses.verse: In the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H259><s%>, in the one and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, came the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> Haggai <S%H2292><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Speak <S%H559><s%> now to Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shealtiel <S%H7597><s%>, governor <S%H6346><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josedech <S%H3087><s%>, the high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%>, and to the residue <S%H7611><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Who is left <S%H7604><s%> among you that saw <S%H7200><s%> this house <S%H1004><s%> in her first <S%H7223><s%> glory <S%H3519><s%>? and how do you see <S%H7200><s%> it now <S%H5869><s%>? is it not in your eyes in comparison of it as nothing <S%H3644><s%>?

Yet now be strong <S%H2388><s%>, O Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; and be strong <S%H2388><s%>, O Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, son <S%H1121><s%> of Josedech <S%H3087><s%>, the high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%>; and be strong <S%H2388><s%>, all you people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and work <S%H6213><s%>: for I am with you <S%H5002><s%>, says the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>:

According to the word <S%H1697><s%> that I covenanted <S%H3772><s%> with you when you came <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, so my spirit <S%H7307><s%> remains <S%H5975><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you <S%H3372><s%>: fear you not.

For thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>; Yet once <S%H259><s%>, it is a little while <S%H4592><s%>, and I will shake <S%H7493><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, and the earth <S%H776><s%>, and the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and the dry land <S%H2724><s%>;

And I will shake <S%H7493><s%> all nations <S%H1471><s%>, and the desire <S%H2532><s%> of all nations <S%H1471><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%>: and I will fill <S%H4390><s%> this house <S%H1004><s%> with glory <S%H3519><s%>, says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>.
The silver <S%H3701><s%> is mine <S%H2091><s%>, and the gold is mine <S%H5002><s%>, says the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>.

The glory <S%H3519><s%> of this latter <S%H314><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> shall be greater than <S%H1419><s%> of the former <S%H7223><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>: and in this place <S%H4725><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%>, says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>.

In the four <S%H702><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> day of the ninth <S%H8671><s%> month <S%H8147><s%>, in the second year <S%H8141><s%> of Darius <S%H1867><s%>, came the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Haggai <S%H2292><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>; Ask <S%H7592><s%> now the priests <S%H3548><s%> concerning the law <S%H8451><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

If one <S%H376><s%> bear <S%H5375><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> in the skirt <S%H3671><s%> of his garment <S%H899><s%>, and with his skirt <S%H3671><s%> do touch <S%H5060><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%>, or stew <S%H5138><s%>, or wine <S%H3196><s%>, or oil <S%H8081><s%>, or any food <S%H3978><s%>, shall it be holy <S%H6942><s%>? And the priests <S%H3548><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%>, No.

Then said <S%H559><s%> Haggai <S%H2292><s%>, If one that is unclean <S%H2931><s%> by a dead body <S%H5315><s%> touch <S%H5060><s%> any of these <S%H2930><s%>, shall it be unclean? And the priests <S%H3548><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%>, It shall be unclean <S%H2930><s%>.

Then answered <S%H6030><s%> Haggai <S%H2292><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, So is this people <S%H5971><s%>, and so is this nation <S%H1471><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me <S%H5002><s%>, says the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; and so is every work <S%H4639><s%> of their hands <S%H3027><s%>; and that which they offer <S%H7126><s%> there is unclean <S%H2931><s%>.

And now <S%H7760><s%>, I pray you, consider from this day <S%H3117><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, from before <S%H2962><s%> a stone <S%H68><s%> was laid <S%H7760><s%> upon a stone <S%H68><s%> in the temple <S%H1964><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>:

Since those days were <S%H935><s%>, when one came to a heap <S%H6194><s%> of twenty <S%H6242><s%> measures <S%H6235><s%>, there were but ten: when one came <S%H935><s%> to the winevat <S%H3342><s%> for to draw out <S%H2834><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> vessels out of the press <S%H6333><s%>, there were but twenty <S%H6242><s%>.

I struck <S%H5221><s%> you with blight <S%H7711><s%> and with mildew <S%H3420><s%> and with hail <S%H1259><s%> in all the labors <S%H4639><s%> of your hands <S%H3027><s%>; yet you turned not to me <S%H5002><s%>, says the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

Consider <S%H7760><s%> now from this day <S%H3117><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, from the four <S%H702><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the ninth <S%H8671><s%> month <S%H3117><s%>, even from the day that the foundation <S%H3245><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s temple <S%H1964><s%> was laid <S%H7760><s%>, consider it.

Is the seed <S%H2233><s%> yet in the barn <S%H4035><s%>? Yes <S%H1612><s%>, as yet the vine, and the fig tree <S%H8384><s%>, and the pomegranate <S%H7416><s%>, and the olive <S%H2132><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%>, has not brought forth <S%H5375><s%>: from this day <S%H3117><s%> will I bless you <S%H1288><s%>.

And again <S%H8145><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came unto Haggai <S%H2292><s%> in the four <S%H702><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
Speak <S%H559><s%> to Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%>, governor <S%H6346><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, I will shake <S%H7493><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> and the earth <S%H776><s%>;

And I will overthrow <S%H2015><s%> the throne <S%H3678><s%> of kingdoms <S%H4467><s%>, and I will destroy <S%H8045><s%> the strength <S%H2392><s%> of the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%>; and I will overthrow <S%H2015><s%> the chariots <S%H4818><s%>, and those that ride <S%H7392><s%> in them <S%H5483><s%>; and the horses and their riders <S%H7392><s%> shall come down <S%H3381><s%>, every one <S%H376><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%> of his brother <S%H251><s%>.

In that day <S%H3117><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, will I take <S%H3947><s%> you <S%H2216><s%>, O Zerubbabel, my servant <S%H5650><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shealtiel <S%H7597><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and will make <S%H7760><s%> you as a signet <S%H2368><s%>: for I have chosen <S%H977><s%> you <S%H5002><s%>, says the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>.
